idea-plugin.description:
Plugin that provides @soundtrack based on iTunes. This plugin works only if you use a Mac. @soundtrack can be used either with code completion or as variable in the file templates.

To setup @soundtrack in your templates: Open Preferences go to Editor -> File and Code Templates -> Includes and select "File Header"
Add the following code: 


#if (${soundtrack} && ${soundtrack} != "")
 *  @soundtrack ${soundtrack}
#end
